entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Go to definition" on instantiation of source type navigates to implicit operator of target type when instantiation emits error #77545
  • Correctness_Determinism failure due to path in .resx file #77544
  • Used assemblies not tracked when binding extension methods without arguments #77542
  • Some attributes are not synthesized for extended partial methods #77529
  • `readonly ref` and `in` parameters removes warning CS0649: Field 'field' was never assigned to. #77528
  • Tooling to validate dependency restrictions, that Visual Studio imposes on Roslyn tools. #77527
  • Behavior of Edit.WordDeleteToEnd on single-line C# comment has changed #77523

Closed

  • `for` loop with multiple uninitialized variables no longer compiles #77160
    17.13
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.13.0 causes build error Error CS0234 : The type or namespace name .. does not exist in the namespace .. (are you missing an assembly reference?) #77472
  • VB SymbolDisplayVisitor.AddMethodName throws InvalidOperationException when formatting C# destructor ISymbol #77459
  • vs 2022 17.13.0 Roslyn ISourceGenerator do not have new line after nullable enable like this '#nullable enableusing System;' #77376
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35911.15 #77522
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35910.77 #77514

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Make sure ExtensionMethodReferenceRewriter rewrites all the "interesting" method references. #77540
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add CI validation of Semantic Search API lists #77535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support inference in collection expressions #77534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Handle explicit type arguments #77532
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Stack Trace Explorer for additional documents #77517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable downloading the runtime packages during restore and instead ensure that it happens when needed (pack) #77515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add runtime async to official build #77537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix issue with 'null conditional assignment' and 'generate variable' #77524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support generate method in null-conditional-assignment #77526
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77530
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Clean up implementation of SourceMethodSymbol.AddSynthesizedAttributes after merge from 'main' #77509
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Mark partial events and ctors as complete #77525
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add completion validation tests #77511
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Share Copilot doc comment option for C# and C++ #77550
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Extensions: Handle lowering for collection initializers #77549
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add IsAvailable to ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProviderImpl #77548
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NFW due to invoking Workspace.RaiseEventForHandlers in the CA process #77546
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add note for issue 51692 to source generator cookbooks #76818
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Show analysis status in task status center instead of status bar #77496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix run code analysis on solution not reporting results #77501
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
